subject: Basketball (College)
Segregation
Blacks
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: A decision by Mitchell and his teammates to play in a N.C.A.A. tournament despite opposition was widely seen as the beginning of the end of segregation in college sports.
snippet: A decision by Mitchell and his teammates to play in a N.C.A.A. tournament despite opposition was widely seen as the beginning of the end of segregation in college sports.
